speaker: speaker1
text: I hear that you've been to the Saikei Ski Resort for the weekend . Did you enjoy it ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Yes , it's so exciting , though I had the most falls in our skiing team .

speaker: speaker1
text: Isn't there any coach to teach you how to ski ?

speaker: speaker2
text: Of course there is . The top-level coaches there are from the State Sports General Administration .

speaker: speaker2
text: Yes.My face even ached in the icy wind .

speaker: speaker2
text: I was skiing on and on excitedly until I realized one thing-I could not stop ! You can just imagine how terrified I was .
